DialogueDictionary.MAIN COMPUTER: Log access granted, SOLAN:
MAIN COMPUTER: Log access granted, SOLANUM. 
USER REQUEST: "Last access granted". Calculating...
DialogueDictionary.MAIN COMPUTER: Last access granted 281,0:
MAIN COMPUTER: Last access granted 281,042 years ago. 
USER = Mallow.
DialogueDictionary.Visualizing progress. Deep space anomaly: Visualizing progress. Deep space anomaly matching all known criteria for the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Eye of the Universe</color>]]> has been found.
<![CDATA[<TimeMinutes>]]> MINUTES, <![CDATA[<TimeSeconds>]]> SECONDS AGO: Data received from previous cycles.
DialogueDictionary.ASH TWIN PROJECT: Receiving data cycle s: <![CDATA[<TimeMinutes>]]> MINUTES, <![CDATA[<TimeSeconds>]]> SECONDS AGO: Data received from previous cycles.

MASKS RECEIVING DATA FROM: 
<![CDATA[<color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color>]]> 
<![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color>]]> memory statue 
<![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Timber Hearth</color>]]> memory statue 
<![CDATA[<color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>]]> memory statue
DialogueDictionary.MASKS RECEIVING DATA FROM: <![CDATA[<col:
MASKS RECEIVING DATA FROM: 
<![CDATA[<color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color>]]> 
<![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color>]]> memory statue 
<![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Timber Hearth</color>]]> memory statue 
<![CDATA[<color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>]]> memory statue
DialogueDictionary.WARNING! Removing the core will disable: WARNING! Removing the core will disable the <![CDATA[<color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>]]>.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: This is strange. Where am I? I: SOLANUM: This is strange. Where am I? I see stars now. Likely, I will find the answers in the sky above.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: It's strange, I don't feel dead: SOLANUM: It's strange, I don't feel dead. Perhaps this is my past uncertainty. This place looks familiar. I assume it's a state of Timber Hea...
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Greetings, friend. I feel diffe: SOLANUM: Greetings, friend. I feel different, but it's hard to explain.
SOLANUM: I’m unsure how I arrived here. I would conjecture that the thought of this place somehow forced my displacement. This has never happened to me before.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: You showed me the death of my c: SOLANUM: You showed me the death of my clan. It's very hard to comprehend. How long do you think it's been since then? I clearly remember Bells guiding me on a pilgrimage to the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>]]>. I suppose my pilgrimage has reached its end.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I’ve never met one of your kind: SOLANUM: I’ve never met one of your kind before. It’s a great honor to speak with you, even by recorder. You have my gratitude for understanding my language.
SOLANUM: I am glad to observe your race. I imagine you have the same thirst for knowledge as ours. I think I saw the <![CDATA[<color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color>]]> and it's broken. It's time to find out what data it managed to collect.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: We've finally found the <![CDAT: SOLANUM: We've finally found the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Eye of the Universe</color>]]>. I wish my clan could see this.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Still, strangers from another s: SOLANUM: Still, the strangers from another star system had important knowledge. They had technology that could understand the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Eye</color>]]> better. I have a hypothesis that the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Eye</color>]]> is dangerous, based on their vision. However, their interpretation could be wrong.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: What do we do with this knowled: SOLANUM: What do we do with this knowledge about the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Eye</color>]]>? I want to learn about it, and I want to find it - but I'm not sure how to reach it.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Am I wrong? Is that Memory Stat: SOLANUM: Am I wrong? Is that Memory Statue active? In this activated state, it should be transmitting data to the <![CDATA[<color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>]]>... I'll take a look at it.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I suspect you have seen this? O: SOLANUM: I suspect you have seen this? Our Sun is dying... but you are paired with one of the statues? Now I understand. Do you know who else is paired at <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Giant's Deep</color>]]>?
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: It's a pity. There are many que: SOLANUM: It's a pity. There are many questions I would ask if I could comprehend your language.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Perhaps, now I am linked to the: SOLANUM: Perhaps, now I am linked to the statue in the same way as you. I ended up right in front of that nearby statue and it opened its eyes.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: There are four masks active at: SOLANUM: There are four masks active at once! I wish Ramie could see this...
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I had a time loop toy when I wa: SOLANUM: I had a time loop toy when I was a child, but I'm unsure how the time loop itself functioned. I may want to visit the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>places from my childhood</color>]]> first, before departing.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: If the <![CDATA[<color=lightblu: SOLANUM: If the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Sun</color>]]> is dying, we must be trapped. Hypothesis: it is possible to survive, if we could get far enough. This is a possible solution.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: From your vision, I now know th: SOLANUM: From your vision, I now know <![CDATA[<color=orange>the Vessel</color>]]> is in <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color>]]>. Do you think I could reach it, like how I reached this place?
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I understand how the time loop: SOLANUM: I understand how the time loop works now and I remember everything from previous cycle.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Daz said: <![CDATA[<i>«Sending: SOLANUM: Daz said: "Sending memories back in time and going back in time physically are two different actions"]]>.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I can imagine such technology w: SOLANUM: I can imagine such technology would be worthy of celebration at the Nomai festival. Now we can try to get to <![CDATA[<color=orange>the Vessel</color>]]>. I'll open the core once again, but next loop it's your turn.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: This was my school, where we b: SOLANUM:  This was my school, where we both are standing. Here, I learned about the universe: stars, space, and time. I assume it's not a safe place anymore. I'm unsure, but I remember the black hole being smaller.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: As a student, I was imagining t: SOLANUM: As a student, I would imagine the universe ending. Conoy told me it wouldn't happen in our lifetimes. That was scary to think about. But what comes after? Perhaps it forms something new.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: It might be unsafe here, so I b: SOLANUM: It might be unsafe here, so I brought this gravity crystal. On this planet, space and time are inextricably linked and limited.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I suppose this crystal is not c: SOLANUM: I suppose this crystal is not completely stable. It's probably because of the black hole's increasing fluctuations. Be careful here.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I spent my childhoom here. Home: SOLANUM: I spent my childhood here. Home for me and my family and friends. The city lies in ruins now... it is sad to see it like this.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: When I was a child, I loved the: SOLANUM: When I was a child, I loved these toys. Pyramidion and shuttle were both my favorites. This is only a small part of the Nomai cultural heritage.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: It's unsafe here, I think. I ca: SOLANUM: It's unsafe here, I think. I can hear the sand rising.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: I don't think they'll be of any: SOLANUM: I don't think they'll be of any use to anyone else. Stay back, please.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: That's incredible! The main sys: SOLANUM: That's incredible! The main systems work despite the damage. I'm sure I can handle this.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: This wall shows incoming messag: SOLANUM: This wall shows incoming messages from other Nomai clans. It may be strange, but they believe the disappearance of Escall's Vessel was a myth.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: It's incredible <![CDATA[<color: SOLANUM: It's incredible <![CDATA[<color=orange>the Vessel</color>]]> can receive these messages here in <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color>]]>. Perhaps I can trace them back...
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: A Nomai, Canna, mentions a safe: SOLANUM: A Nomai, Canna, mentions a safe place called the <![CDATA[<color=orange>"Blackrock"</color>]]> system, somewhere in the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Gloaming Galaxy</color>]]>.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: The ship has the message source: SOLANUM: The ship has the message source's coordinates! I can put it up on the display, which must be somewhere. Please find it. If we decide to warp, we need the warp core from the <![CDATA[<color=orange> Ash Twin Project</color>]]>. The original core is irreparably damaged.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Thinking of such a possibility: SOLANUM: Thinking of such a possibility is exciting. But I do not fear this. In fact, after all that has happened, I have no fear at all. These are simply the laws by which the universe lives.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Two conscious observers startin: SOLANUM: Two conscious observers starting a journey towards destiny. I can feel the uncertainty grow enormously. It hasn't felt this strong since I left the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>]]>.
SOLANUM: There will be no turning back. I am ready for whatever is next, friend. The decision is yours.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Two conscious observers have re: SOLANUM: Two conscious observers have reached the Eye of the Universe. I accept your decision.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM: Would you try to enter it?: SOLANUM: Would you try to enter it?
DialogueDictionary.Solanum, the last Nomai alive, acquired: Solanum, the last Nomai alive, acquired Quantum Consciousness as a result of a paradox. She entered the Eye with me.
DialogueDictionary.I was in the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>S: I was in the <![CDATA[<color=lightblue>Sunless City</color>]]>. I met other Nomai there: Laevi, Tage, Lami and others. Perhaps our journey has reached its end.
DialogueDictionary.I went for ... for ... <![CDATA[<i>mushr: I went for... for... mushrooms]]>. Don't take my spot! I'll be back soon. Get the new launch codes]]> at the Observatory, Hornfels changed them at the last minute.
DialogueDictionary.Hey! What's going on? Where's the angler: Hey! What's going on? Where's the anglerfish?
DialogueDictionary.My tiny friend is gone! I called this an: My tiny friend is gone! I had named this anglerfish <![CDATA[<color=orange>«Ernesto»</color>]]>. I can't believe he left me like that...
DialogueDictionary.Poor <![CDATA[<color=orange>Ernesto</col: Poor <![CDATA[<color=orange>Ernesto</color>]]>... Here are the <![CDATA[<color=orange>new launch codes</color>]]>...
DialogueDictionary.I just need <![CDATA[<color=orange>new l: I just need the <![CDATA[<color=orange>new launch codes</color>]]>.
DialogueDictionary.Oh, why are you still here? Did you get: Oh, why are you still here? Did you get the <![CDATA[<color=orange>new launch codes</color>]]> yet?
DialogueDictionary.Is that the anglerfish from the museum?: Is that the anglerfish from the museum?
DialogueDictionary.The anglerfish from the museum exhibitio: The anglerfish from the museum exhibit. Hornfels named it that.
DialogueDictionary.Okay, you know what? Yes, it is the angl: Okay, you know what? Yes, it is the anglerfish from the museum. I'm fed up with eating marshmallows. I can't take it anymore.
DialogueDictionary.So you decided to eat <![CDATA[<color=or: So you decided to eat <![CDATA[<color=orange>Ernesto</color>]]>?! Hornfels said <![CDATA[<color=orange>Ernesto</color>]]> was their friend!
DialogueDictionary.Anglerfish is still a fish. Whatever he: An anglerfish is still a fish. Whatever they call it, it's almost done cooking.]]>.]]>.]]> or not. I think it will be prepared in like, 30 minutes]]>. Why don't you fly near Dark Bramble]]> and just get a new one for Hornfels?
DialogueDictionary.You'll do that for me? Thanks! Just don': You'll do that for me? Thanks! Just don't tell anyone about <![CDATA[<color=orange>Ernesto</color>]]>, alright?
There is no accounting for taste.
DialogueDictionary.Thank you! Get back within <![CDATA[<i>3: Thank you! Get back within 30 minutes]]> and I'll give you a bite.
DialogueDictionary.Hmm... This seems like a good place for: Hmm... This seems like a good place for the Vision Torch! I can put it here if needed.

UIDictionary.THE_VISION_TO_BE_CONTINUED:
YOU AND SOLANUM ESCAPE FAR BEYOND THE REACH OF THE SUPERNOVA AND MEET THE NOMAI ON BLACKROCK. 
TOGETHER YOU WATCH THE STARS GO OUT.
UIDictionary.THE_VISION_POPUP: Thank you for downloading The Vision! Check your ship logs to start a new story.

ShipLogDictionary.I can hear Solanum's signal coming from: I can hear Solanum's signal coming from Brittle Hollow.
I found Solanum in the School.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum said this is where she went to s: Solanum said this is where she went to school. She also mentioned that the black hole used to be much smaller. She took a gravity crystal to avoid falling.
ShipLogDictionary.I can hear Solanum's signal coming from: I can hear Solanum's signal coming from the Sunless City.
ShipLogDictionary.I found Solanum in the Sunless City. She: I found Solanum in the Sunless City. She is staying at her home in the Eye Temple district.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum feels sad about the Nomai's blin: Solanum feels sad about the Nomai's blind faith in the Eye. She destroyed her old toys.
ShipLogDictionary.She feels sad seeing the Sunless City in: She feels sad seeing the Sunless City in ruins. Solanum told me a little about her childhood.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum wants to try to get to the Vesse: Solanum wants to try to get to the Vessel. Is it possible for her to get inside Dark Bramble?
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum did it! Whatever her power is, s: Solanum did it! Whatever her power may be, she's here and waiting for me once again.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum has traced the coordinates of in: Solanum has traced the coordinates of the incoming Nomai messages. Canna, a modern Nomai, declares that there's a safe place in the Gloaming Galaxy. The coordinates to the Blackrock system should be shown under the Vessel's bridge instead of the Eye signal hologram.
ShipLogDictionary.I found new coordinates to another Galax: I found new coordinates to another Galaxy. We can use the Warp Core from the Ash Twin Project to warp. There will be no turning back once I warp. Am I ready to do this?
ShipLogDictionary.I found the coordinates to the Gloaming: I found the coordinates to the Gloaming Galaxy. We can use the warp core from the Ash Twin Project to warp. There will be no turning back. Am I ready to do this?
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum wants to visit Giant's Deep, but: Solanum wants to visit Giant's Deep, but she will probably stay on Timber Hearth as well.
ShipLogDictionary.I found Solanum observing the probe logs: I found Solanum observing the probe logs. I've never seen Nomai computers with such a green glow. She's accessing the Main Computer to know how much time has passed.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum feels sad about the Eye of the U: Solanum feels sad about the Eye of the Universe. Since childhood, she knew - the Eye has no wishes at all. It's not surprising that she don't want to know anything more about it. There was an active Memory Statue here that caught her eye.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum is contemplating the Eye, and th: Solanum is contemplating the Eye, and the vision seen by the inhabitants of The Stranger. She also noticed a working Memory Statue.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum is the last Nomai alive. What if: Solanum is the last Nomai alive. What if I show her all I know using a vision torch from the Damaged Laboratory on The Stranger?
ShipLogDictionary.After the vision something strange happe: After the vision something strange happened. The clouds disappeared immediately and I can now hear a strange frequency coming from Solanum. There are bizarre looking sparks on her mask.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum looks disoriented according to h: Solanum seems disoriented according to her reply.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum left some text near her body: Solanum left some text near her body
ShipLogDictionary.There are some new inscriptions left ver: There are some new inscriptions left very recently
ShipLogDictionary.It must be very strange to see your own: It must be very strange to see your own dead body. I'm not surprised Solanum that wants to leave this place as soon as possible. She took her recorder and vanished on mentioning Timber Hearth.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum's message abruptly stopped while: Solanum's message abruptly stopped while mentioning Timber Hearth.
ShipLogDictionary.Vision Torch in Damaged Laboratory: Vision Torch in the Damaged Laboratory
ShipLogDictionary.I believe there is a vision torch somewh: I believe there is a vision torch somewhere in the Damaged Laboratory. I wonder if it's still working.
ShipLogDictionary.I found that vision torch. Its flames st: I found the vision torch. Its flames still work even in space where there is no oxygen.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum's message was interrupted when s: Solanum's message was interrupted when she mentioned Timber Hearth. Maybe she is there?
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum somehow appeared on Timber Heart: Solanum somehow appeared on Timber Hearth near the Village. It seems like she is observing the Hearthians.
ShipLogDictionary.According to her recorder, she just thou: According to her recorder, she just thought of Timber Hearth and appeared there. That could be explainable with my new Quantum Rule. Solanum told me about the Sun Station, she apologized, but that's ok. Solanum would also like to know more about the Probe Tracking Module inside Giant's Deep.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum thought of Timber Hearth, then a: Solanum thought of Timber Hearth, then appeared there. She wants to know more about the Probe Tracking Module inside Giant's Deep.
ShipLogDictionary.I've discovered strange frequency called: I've discovered a strange frequency called Quantum Consciousness.
ShipLogDictionary.This could be a new quantum rule or an q: This could be a new quantum rule or a quantum exception. My theory is that if an observer is aware of its quantum properties, it acquires Quantum Consciousness. Solanum got this knowledge from my vision.
ShipLogDictionary.Quantum Consciousness has a strong recog: Quantum Consciousness has a strong and recognizable signal which sounds similar to Quantum Fluctuations. In fact, the signal is so strong that it can be heard even without the signalscope.
ShipLogDictionary.Another noticable thing about Quantum Co: Another noticeable thing about Quantum Consciousness - particles near the head. It seems like other quantum rules do not work with Quantum Consciousness.
ShipLogDictionary.Quantum Consciousness somehow has the ab: Quantum Consciousness somehow has the ability to exist in a multiple places at the same time. According to Solanum, she is only capable of appearing at certain locations by thinking about them. Hypothesis: she can appear only in known places.
ShipLogDictionary.Another noticeable feature of Quantum Co: Another noticeable feature of Quantum Consciousness - particles appear near the possessor's head. Note: it appears that the other quantum rules do not apply to a being with Quantum Consciousness.
ShipLogDictionary.A possessor of Quantum Consciousness som: A possessor of Quantum Consciousness somehow has the ability to exist in multiple places at once. According to Solanum, she is capable of appearing at certain locations by thinking about them. It is likely that she can appear only in places she knows.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum inside Ash Twin Project: Solanum inside the Ash Twin Project
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum wants to check the time loop con: Solanum wants to check the time loop control panel. I might find her inside the Ash Twin Project.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum is already here. She observing t: Solanum is already here. She is observing the Time Loop Ring's logs.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum just realized I'm in the time lo: Solanum just realized I'm in the time loop and that our Sun will supernova soon. Using the charged warp core, we might be able to escape. It seems like we will meet again inside the Vessel.
ShipLogDictionary.Now she knows about the time loop and th: Solanum now knows about the time loop and that our Sun will soon go supernova. She wants to reach the Vessel, but she also wants to revisit places from her childhood. I can try to find her on the Vessel, or somewhere else.
ShipLogDictionary.Solanum just happened to pass right by t: Solanum happened to pass by the unpaired statue inside the Ash Twin Project. Now she's aware of the time loop too.
ShipLogDictionary.Now that Solanum knows how time loop res: Now that Solanum knows how time loop reset works, we will try reach the Vessel.
ShipLogDictionary.Last cycle, Solanum was not sure how the: Last cycle, Solanum was not sure how the time loop worked. This cycle it seems as if she understands everything, and wants to go to the Vessel.
ShipLogDictionary.Seriously, how could an anglerfish just: Seriously, how could an anglerfish just disappear?
ShipLogDictionary.Hornfels said that anglerfish «Ernesto»: Hornfels said that the anglerfish "Ernesto" disappeared from its exhibit.
ShipLogDictionary.I found Slate with Ernesto. He's cooking: I found Slate with Ernesto. They're cooking it on a campfire.
ShipLogDictionary.Slate is just fed up with marshmallow, t: Slate is fed up with marshmallow and decided to cook Ernesto. They said it will be ready in 30 minutes. Intervention isn't required because the loop will reset before that happens.
